programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A merciless triple homicide in New Orleans, Louisiana leaves law enforcement with puzzling clues, but as they piece together the mystery, they quickly realize there is more to the murders than a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: After the murder of a grandmother in the suburbs of Cincinnati, it takes nearly a year, a microscopic clue, and a piece of jewelry as unique as a fingerprint for law enforcement to bring the murderer to justice.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Elderly widows target homeless men in plots to cash in on murder; an art investor bilks Hollywood celebrities out of millions of dollars.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Police may have steered young Christopher Tapp into a false confession for a vicious murder; white supremacist Buford Furrow goes on a killing spree.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Deranged Alexander Pichushkin goes on a killing spree near Moscow; art dealer Larry Salander swindles his big-name clients.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: The body of missing doctoral student Annie Le is found stuffed inside a basement wall; the IRS targets actor Wesley Snipes.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.sub-title: Death of the King of Pop
programme.desc: Minutes after Michael Jackson dies, his personal physician, Dr. Conrad Murray, launches a cover-up; a greedy stock trader nearly takes down Wall Street.
